channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:20 Air alarm to Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 09:20 Air alarm to Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.#Sumy_oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 09:17 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack lasts
item.description: 🟠 09:17 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack lasts This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 09:17 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk into shelter!
item.description: 🔴 09:17 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk into shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
